text: @StPeters1019  I agree with you on $AAPL.  I think you remember years ago when I was all over it.  But it has dried up from an options standpoint.  I think you are doing the right thing.  But, one difference between Apple then and $AFRM UPST ABNB now … those hot momo companies today have nosebleed valuations, while Apple back then had an ex cash P/E of 10.  So be wary of taking too much position risk at any one time, because you never know when a nosebleed market will implode, like Nov/Dec 2018 for example.  Have a good weekend!
